Title: Refund Policy for CultPass

You are eligible for a full refund if:
- You cancel within 7 days of purchase
- The class was not attended
- The order was not delivered

To request a refund:
1. Contact support
2. Provide your order number
3. We will process within 3-5 business days

For unused subscriptions, pro-rated refunds are available.
Contact us and we'll be happy to help!
